entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who told Hagrid how to give gifts to the Gurg.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the one who is giving gifts to the Gurg and explaining how to do it.

entities.name: gurg
entities.description: The Gurg is a title given to the chief of the group.

entities.name: karkus
entities.description: Karkus is mentioned as the biggest, ugliest, and laziest Gurg who is waiting to be fed by others.

entities.name: olymppe
entities.description: Olympe is mentioned as someone who went down the mountainside with Hagrid.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the people asking questions about how to give gifts to the Gurg.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another person who is asking questions about how to give gifts to the Gurg.

relationships.description: Hagrid has to give gifts to the Gurg as per Dumbledore's instructions.
Hagrid went down the mountainside with Olympe.
